name: (One of The) World's Smallest Dungeons
description:
I don't normally make games, beside that one game I made as a joke a while back...Let's not mention that. This is more or less just me messing around in order to see if I can make a game or not. The game isn't too in depth so do not expect that.  What you can expect is periodic updates (probably every month depending on my schedule). 

All sound effects and music used are royalty free from soundbible.com except for the jumping sound effect that came when I purchased the software.

I would like some CONSTRUCTIVE criticism as well, such as suggestions or some kind of help. Heck, it's fine to RESPECTFULLY disagree.

Controls: AD or left/right arrow keys to move. Space to jump, S or down arrow to go down. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here is the story as it is right now:

You have been sent by the king to the catacombs to find his lost daughter. Once you enter the catacombs the exit becomes blocked off and you discover there to be much more to the catacombs then you thought...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME IS NOT FINISHED OR FINAL AND PAYMENT IS NOT REQUIRED TO PLAY THE GAME!!!

Be sure to check out the community and also my patreon by clicking the links under "more information".
